titles.title: State Regulatory Representation Clarification Act of 2017
State Regulatory Representation Clarification Act of 2017
A bill to clarify membership requirements for the Board of Directors of the Federal Deposit Insurance Corporation.
State Regulatory Representation Clarification Act of 2017

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Banking, Housing, and Urban Affairs.

committee.name: Senate Banking, Housing, and Urban Affairs
